info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:58PM EDT until June 16 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MADISON...SOUTHERN RAPPAHANNOCK AND NORTHWESTERN CULPEPER COUNTIES... At 458 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sperryville, or 11 miles northwest of Culpeper, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Castleton, Five Forks, Cardova, Viewtown, Nethers, Woodville, Boston and Rock Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
